query: SELECT code, used, expiresAt, NOW() as currentTime, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), expiresAt) as secondsUntilExpiry FROM otpCodes WHERE email='sergei@mail.ru' ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user hVwujcZ1ppKYgyC.root --database Mef2gZ2igQdMvww2Yiqe9P --execute SELECT code, used, expiresAt, NOW() as currentTime, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), expiresAt) as secondsUntilExpiry FROM otpCodes WHERE email='sergei@mail.ru' ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1
